attributes.action: Make it law that every car manufacturer should make their cars use dipped headlights at all times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To get all car manufacturers to make dipped headlights come on at all times as soon as you turn on the ignition. This is a very good safety feature. At the present time the roads are full of people who do not have the correct lights on in dim or rainy conditions. Some have side lights on, some have fog lights on, some have no lights on!. This petition is aimed at forcing all car manufacturers to make their cars have dipped headlights on at all times.
